thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com
thread.title: Krystina

author: Krystina
title: Krystina
text:
Using this website was surprisingly easy. The different varieties were pictured well, they had easily available sizing charts, reviews and reviews on sizing specifically! Great site.
However - with so many items going out of stock (maybe it's just that time of the year before they restock, whatever), I'd really think when you have your size "selected," they'd only show ones that are available in your size. I would say I spent most of my time clicking through these, only to find that most of them weren't available in my size. Would have been great and probably saved me about 15 minutes of time, if not more, to just have had the ones available.
